speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you doing today?

speaker: Customer
text: Oh great, another goddamn phone call! What's your problem?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with MegaLoans. Can you please confirm your address?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the hell would I tell you anything? You really think I’ll cooperate?

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. I just need to verify your identity before discussing the account details.

speaker: Customer
text: Screw your verification! You’re just wasting my time, you idiots!

speaker: Agent
text: I assure you, I'm here to help you resolve this. You currently have a balance of $800.

speaker: Customer
text: Yeah? And what do you want me to do about it, huh?

speaker: Agent
text: We can discuss payment options that work for you. Would you prefer a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: You think I give a damn about your plans? I’m not paying a penny!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand that this is a tough situation. However, ignoring the debt will only lead to further issues.

speaker: Customer
text: Issues? I've got bigger problems than your stupid debt! Just leave me alone!

speaker: Agent
text: I see, but I must advise you that there are consequences for non-payment. I’m here to help if you decide to talk.

speaker: Customer
text: Help? You call harassing me help? Get lost!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time. If you change your mind, please give us a call back.
